DOC.brief_summary: Microcirculation , especially skin microcirculation , window towards systemic vascular function magnitude underlie mechanism . Different technique develop assess microcirculation . Among technique , laser technology use perform non-invasive microvascular assessment . Although technique widely use , different methodological issue remain . This study aim define way use laser clinical use .
DOC.brief_title: Methodological Issues Laser Speckle Contrast Imaging
DOC.criteria: age > 18years old subject without know cardiovascular disease pregnancy
DOC.keyword: laser Doppler flowmetry , skin blood flow
